input: filename (path to file containing sets of linear equations)
output: consistency analysis for each system of equations

steps.step: Parse linear equation systems from input file

substeps.step: Open and read the specified file
For each line in the file:
Initialize empty equation array
Split line into tokens
Process each token, skipping operators (+, -, =)
Convert coefficients using _coeff helper method
Apply negative sign if preceded by '-' operator
Add equation to current equation set
Detect equation set boundaries using blank lines
Store all equation sets in object's eqn attribute
If token is alphabetic (variable), return coefficient 1
If token is numeric, return integer value
If token starts with negative sign, return negated value
If token ends with alphabetic character, extract numeric prefix

steps.step: Extract coefficient matrix and constant vector

substeps.step: Determine dimensions of system (n equations, m variables)
Initialize coefficient matrix A with zeros
Initialize constant vector B with zeros
For each equation, populate A with coefficients
For each equation, populate B with negated constants
Determine minimum dimension of matrix
For each possible rank r from min dimension down to 1:
Generate all possible r√ór submatrices
Calculate determinant of each submatrix
If any determinant is non-zero, return r as the rank
If no non-zero determinant found, return rank 0

steps.step: Analyze system consistency using rank method

substeps.step: Extract matrices A and B from equation set
Form augmented matrix [A|B]
Calculate rank of coefficient matrix A
Calculate rank of augmented matrix [A|B]
Apply rank theorem to determine consistency:
If rank(A) = rank([A|B]) = number of variables: Unique solution
If rank(A) = rank([A|B]) < number of variables: Infinitely many solutions
If rank(A) < rank([A|B]): No solution (inconsistent system)
Otherwise: Analysis inconclusive

input: input file containing linear equation systems
output: consistency analysis for each system of equations

steps.step: Initialize Determinants object with input file
For each equation set in the parsed data:

substeps.step: Display the equation set
Call analyze_consistency method
Display consistency analysis result
